main event: An observation of a hot air balloon with an unusual flag attached in Crosby, North Dakota on 12/29/66.
interesting points: The object was described consistently with a hot air balloon,The report concluded that it was a probable pilot air balloon,No unusual or unexplained phenomena were involved, There were instructions for sketching the observation and motion of the object, The witness had prior experience in radio study since 1935.
sighted object: hot air balloon with an unusual flag
witness description: Female, age 27, with radio study experience since 1935.
